ComicInfo.Characters: Desmond Morris,Shanhara,Tina Morris,Troy Whitaker,Vlad Yakiov,X-O Manowar
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:06:56 [Issue ID 4000-743397] urn:comicvine:4000-743397
ComicInfo.Summary:
Harvey Award-winning writer Dennis “Hopeless” Hallum (Star Wars: Darth Vader–Dark Visions) and breakout star Emilio Laiso (Marvel’s Spider-Man: Velocity) unleash Valiant’s most powerful protector!
Torn from the past and bonded with a living alien armor, will X-O Manowar become the hero the world needs?
As a futuristic force arises to destroy the planet, only this ancient warrior king has the courage to stand against impossible odds!
